I don’t want to believe
that he of all people has
come to Pasio.

We need to find the person responsible for what
happened at the beach. Let’s split up into two
groups so we cover more ground.

But if you find the culprit before I do, be careful.
If it’s who I think it is, he’s a very dangerous man.
